title: Northern Football League (Scotland)
text:
The Northern League was a regional <a href="Scotland">Scottish</a> <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> competition held between 1891 and 1920.
In <a href="1908%26amp%3Bndash%3B09%20in%20Scottish%20football">1908–09</a>, six clubs left to form the <a href="Central%20Football%20League">Central Football League</a> and the league shut down for the <a href="First%20World%20War">First World War</a>, returning for a final season in <a href="1919%26amp%3Bndash%3B20%20in%20Scottish%20football">1919–20</a>.
<a href="Dundee%20F.C.">Dundee</a> 'A' won the title five times, also sharing it on a sixth occasion.
